t: The Wand Company | Makers of the world’s finest functional pop culture collectibles
s: The Wand Company was founded in 2009 to create the world’s first real magic wand after Chris Barnardo and Richard Blakesley had the idea of putting advanced electronics inside a traditional-looking wizard’s wand.
